channel.title: TGRoss
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGRoss, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A Bullish Collapse?
item.description: Hey, Ross here — and before we sign off for the year, I want to show you something most traders completely misread. The VIX just collapsed from above ...

item.title: Tis the Season to be Bullish
item.description: Hey, Ross here. With Monday’s surge still fresh, I’m digging into why this really is the season to stay bullish—even in a shortened trading week. Desp...

item.title: The Stock Picker’s Market
item.description: The government shutdown hasn’t hit the markets yet, but it’s about to stir things up. With key economic data, like job numbers, delayed indefinitely, ...
